What if…

Ronan was captured by the skrulls in the 90’s and that was a Skrull in guardians of the galaxy. trying to destroy the peace treaty of the kree and xandarians?

blog.name: fantomcomics
blog.title: Fantom Comics
blog.description: A comic shop in Washington, D.C. for everyone.

title: What’s out this week? 7/18/18
body:
It’s Jake’s last week at Fantom <///3

The Life of Captain Marvel #1 by Margaret Stohl and Carlos Pacheco

The definitive origin story of Carol Danvers! If you’ve been keeping up with Captain Marvel, don’t worry, it’s still Margaret Stohl writing. If you’ve never read Captain Marvel and you’re interested in the character because of the upcoming film, this is the perfect place to jump on.

Euthanauts #1 by Tini Howard, Nick Robles, and Aditya Bidikar

The next crazy sci-fi series from IDW’s fantastic Black Crown line of indie-style comics. If you’ve been into DC’s Young Animal line (Doom Patrol, Shade the Changing Girl) you should definitely check this one out.

Oh S#!t It’s Kim & Kim #1 by Magdalene Visaggio, Eva Cabrera, Claudia Aguirre, Zakk Saam, and Katy Rex

The next story arc of intergalactic queer punk rock bounty hunters Kim and Kim! Ya know the deal.

Rat Queens Special: Neon Static one-shot by Kurtis J. Wiebe, William Kirkby, and Ryan Ferrier

Rat Queens has lost its share of buzz over the years, but these one-shots are always super fun, and we’re really excited to see indie sci-fi artist William Kirkby getting his big break! Whether you’ve been keeping up with RQ or not, check out this sci-fi twist on the action/comedy fantasy series.

tags: I guess there's no reason to not read the comics now lmao
summary: Comic book hero’s story takes flight from the coast of Maine
title: Comic book hero’s story takes flight from the coast of Maine
excerpt: 'The Life of Captain Marvel' tells the back story of the character and her summers in the Harpswell area before the first Hollywood movie debuts.
description: hey guys, I saw this article pop up in my local news and I thought it was really interesting. It’s not often my precious home state gets the recognition it deserves, and so I wanted to share it here and help spread the love! ❤
